00036 
00037 #include "config.h"
00038 
00039 #include <gssapi/gssapi.h>
00040 #include <string.h>
00041 
00042 
00043 #define g_OID_equal(o1,o2) \
00044    (((o1)->length == (o2)->length) && \
00045     (memcmp((o1)->elements,(o2)->elements,(int) (o1)->length) == 0))
00046 
00047 struct mech2file {
00048         gss_OID_desc mech;
00049         char         filename[8];
00050 };
00051 
00052 struct mech2file m2f[] = {
00053         {{9, "\052\206\110\206\367\022\001\002\002"}, "krb5"},
00054         {{7, "\053\006\001\005\005\001\003"}, "spkm3"},
00055         {{7, "\053\006\001\005\005\001\009"}, "lipkey"},
00056         {{0,0},""},
00057 };
00058 
00059 /*
00060  * Find the Linux svcgssd downcall file name given the mechanism
00061  */
00062 char *
00063 mech2file(gss_OID mech)
00064 {
00065         struct mech2file *m2fp = m2f;
00066 
00067         while(m2fp->mech.length != 0) {
00068                 if (g_OID_equal(mech,&m2fp->mech))
00069                         return(m2fp->filename);
00070                 m2fp++;
00071         }
00072         return NULL;
00073 }
